summary: A slightly modified alternate texture for the Tera Timerender robe, with an alpha mask to give you lacy leggings.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small modification of the Tera Timerender robe diffuse map, adding some alpha masking on the leggings to make them lacy.  The directory assumes the CBBE version installed but it\'s just a texture bitmap, it should work fine with any of the other versions of Tera armor sets if the filename/uvmaps are the same (should be).  This also assumes the modder that converted your version of Tera armors left the character\'s body mesh in the NIF (as frigus did).

Note this is only a texture file, you need some version of the Tera Online armors installed, for example Frigus\'s: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29411

Please note this will overwrite the original texture file so you may wish to back up the original before installing!
author: pjz
